description: Do you like Mammut's Trovat series? Then you’ll love this model. The Trovat Guide II High GTX Men is the new mountain hiking shoe in this product family, building on and improving the properties of the previous incarnation. It features almost the same last and materials as its predecessor to ensure the same excellent fit. However, the Trovat Guide II High GTX Men has been fine-tuned to unveil a fresh new look for the mountains. Base Fit® provides firm support for the heel. The selected 3D Memo Foam creates an individualized fit at the heel, while the elasticated tongue construction makes the shoe easier to put on. A shoe that will accompany you reliably through the mountains.
name: Mammut Trovat Guide II High GTX - Mens
